entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Target runtime preprocessor directives #28837
  • `Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Publish.ZipDeploy.targets` fails to create `PubTmp` temporary directory on `dotnet publish` #28830

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #28844
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #28843
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.404 #28841
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Do not eagerly discover CWD during parser construction #28836
    Area-CLI, cli-ux, 7.0.2xx

Merged

  • Update Arcade to Use svc providers - release/6.0.3xx branch #28745
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.112 #28839
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.307 #28840
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 3.1.426 #28838
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #28668
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 7.0.101 #28795
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Switch back to the shipped RC2 build #28785
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable codeql in servicing #28605
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update Arcade to Use svc providers - release/6.0.1xx branch #28744
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add Blazor SWA Baseline Mismatched Assets Logging #27542
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Introduce PublishRuntimeIdentifier #28717
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add PackageDependenciesDesignTime to cache assets file #28405
  • Introduce PublishSelfContained #28714
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Set the Framework and Runtime options as required for 'dotnet store' #25435
    Area-Infrastructure
  • removed `v` prefix from `dotnetcli` host version #28776
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28828
    Area-Infrastructure
